description:
Re-factor VPN dialog enable/disable logic

Also fixes related bug (20712) and disables Group Name UI (19252).

BUG=chromium-os:20712,chromium-os:19252
TEST=Test connecting to a new VPN of each type

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=102854

messages.text:
LGTM with two optional nits.

http://codereview.chromium.org/8036042/diff/1/chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc
File chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/8036042/diff/1/chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc#newcode518
chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc:518: // TODO(stevenjb,kmixter): Uncomment if we implement this.
nit: Uncomment -> Set true

http://codereview.chromium.org/8036042/diff/1/chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc#newcode519
chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc:519: // This is not currently imlemented with no immediate plans to do so.
nit: imlemented -> implemented

http://codereview.chromium.org/8036042/diff/1/chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc#newcode594
chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc:594: bool enable_psk_passphrase = false;
Ah, this is much nicer!

http://codereview.chromium.org/8036042/diff/1/chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc
File chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/8036042/diff/1/chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc#newcode518
chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc:518: // TODO(stevenjb,kmixter): Uncomment if we implement this.
On 2011/09/26 22:45:06, James Cook (Chromium) wrote:
> nit: Uncomment -> Set true

Done.

http://codereview.chromium.org/8036042/diff/1/chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc#newcode519
chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc:519: // This is not currently imlemented with no immediate plans to do so.
On 2011/09/26 22:45:06, James Cook (Chromium) wrote:
> nit: imlemented -> implemented

Done.

http://codereview.chromium.org/8036042/diff/1/chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc#newcode594
chrome/browser/chromeos/options/vpn_config_view.cc:594: bool enable_psk_passphrase = false;
On 2011/09/26 22:45:06, James Cook (Chromium) wrote:
> Ah, this is much nicer!
Thanks :)

subject: Re-factor VPN dialog enable/disable logic
